title: Structured Arrays Lab
description: In this lab, we will learn about structured arrays in NumPy. Structured arrays are ndarrays whose datatype is a composition of simpler datatypes organized as a sequence of named fields. They are useful for working with structured data, such as tabular data, where each field represents a different attribute of the data.
